statements: SELECT * FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_id = 1;

SELECT loan_id, interest_rate FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_amount >= 15000;

SELECT loan_id, loan_duration FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE payment_frequency = 'quarterly';

SELECT * FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_duration <= 48;

SELECT * FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_id = 1;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE interest_rate > 5;
SELECT loan_id, payment_frequency FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_amount > 100000;
SELECT * FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_duration < 12 AND payment_frequency = 'monthly';
SELECT loan_id, interest_rate FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE interest_rate <= 4;
SELECT AVG(interest_rate) AS avg_interest_rate FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_duration >= 24;
SELECT loan_id, payment_frequency, loan_duration FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE interest_rate = 3.5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_loans FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_amount < 50000;
SELECT MAX(interest_rate) AS max_interest_rate FROM loan_interest_payments;
SELECT MIN(loan_amount) AS min_loan_amount FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE payment_frequency = 'quarterly';
SELECT DISTINCT payment_frequency FROM loan_interest_payments;
SELECT loan_id, loan_duration FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE payment_frequency IN ('monthly', 'weekly');
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loan_interest_payments ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount, MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_duration <= 36;
SELECT loan_id, payment_frequency, loan_duration FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE payment_frequency LIKE '%ly';
SELECT loan_id, loan_duration FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_amount >= 75000 AND interest_rate < 6;
SELECT loan_id, interest_rate, payment_frequency FROM loan_interest_payments ORDER BY loan_amount ASC;
SELECT loan_id, payment_frequency, loan_duration FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE interest_rate < 3 OR loan_amount > 120000;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate, payment_frequency, loan_duration FROM loan_interest_payments WHERE loan_amount + interest_rate > 100000;
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, borrower_name FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, borrower_name FROM loans WHERE loan_duration > 12;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, borrower_name FROM loans WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_duration FROM loans ORDER BY loan_duration ASC;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS average_loan_amount FROM loans;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM loans;
SELECT SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loans;
SELECT borrower_name, COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM loans GROUP BY borrower_name;
SELECT borrower_name, AVG(interest_rate) AS average_interest_rate FROM loans GROUP BY borrower_name;
SELECT * FROM investments;
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount, investor_name FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000;
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount, investor_name FROM investments WHERE investment_duration < 24;

SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investments ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_investments FROM investments;
SELECT SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment_amount FROM investments;
SELECT investor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_investments FROM investments GROUP BY investor_name;

SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000 AND investment_type = 'Stocks'

SELECT SUM(amount) FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, investor_name FROM loans l JOIN payments p ON l.loan_id = p.loan_id JOIN investments i ON p.investment_id = i.investment_id

SELECT payment_id, investment_id, payment_amount FROM investment_payments;
SELECT payment_date FROM investment_payments;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.loan_amount, loans.interest_rate, loan_payments.payment_amount, loan_payments.payment_date FROM loans INNER JOIN loan_payments ON loans.loan_id = loan_payments.loan_id;

SELECT investments.investment_id, investments.investment_amount, investments.expected_return, investment_payments.payment_amount, investment_payments.payment_date FROM investments INNER JOIN investment_payments ON investments.investment_id = investment_payments.investment_id;
SELECT loans.borrower_name, loans.borrower_address, loan_payments.payment_amount, loan_payments.payment_date FROM loans INNER JOIN loan_payments ON loans.loan_id = loan_payments.loan_id;

SELECT investments.investor_name, investments.investor_email, investment_payments.payment_amount, investment_payments.payment_date FROM investments INNER JOIN investment_payments ON investments.investment_id = investment_payments.investment_id;

SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_duration < 12;
SELECT * FROM loan_payments WHERE payment_amount >= 500;
SELECT * FROM investment_payments WHERE payment_amount < 1000;
SELECT * FROM loans
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, borrower_name FROM loans WHERE loan_term > 12
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount, investor_name FROM investments WHERE expected_return > 0.05
SELECT lp.payment_id, lp.payment_amount, l.loan_amount, l.borrower_name FROM loan_payments lp JOIN loans l ON lp.loan_id = l.loan_id
SELECT ip.payment_id, ip.payment_amount, i.investment_amount, i.investor_name FROM investment_payments ip JOIN investments i ON ip.investment_id = i.investment_id
SELECT l.loan_id, l.loan_amount, COUNT(lp.payment_id) AS num_payments FROM loans l LEFT JOIN loan_payments lp ON l.loan_id = lp.loan_id GROUP BY l.loan_id
SELECT i.investment_id, i.investment_amount, AVG(ip.payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM investments i LEFT JOIN investment_payments ip ON i.investment_id = ip.investment_id GROUP BY i.investment_id

SELECT AVG(investment_amount) AS avg_investment_amount FROM investments
SELECT loan_id, MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment_amount FROM loan_payments GROUP BY loan_id
SELECT i.investment_id, MIN(ip.payment_amount) AS min_payment_amount FROM investment_payments ip JOIN investments i ON ip.investment_id = i.investment_id GROUP BY i.investment_id
SELECT borrower_name, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loans GROUP BY borrower_name HAVING sum(loan_amount) > 10000
SELECT investor_name, AVG(investment_amount) AS avg_investment_amount FROM investments GROUP BY investor_name HAVING AVG(investment_amount) > 5000

SELECT DISTINCT investor_name FROM investments
